classSpec.desc: provides attributes used to decorate rows or cells of a table.
assegna degli attributi utilizzati per decorare righe e celle di una tabella
proporciona atributos usados para decorar filas o celdas de una tabla.

attDef.desc: indicates the kind of information held in this cell or in each cell of this row.
specifica il tipo di informazione contenuta nela cella in questione o in ciascuna delle celle della riga presa in esame
especifica el tipo de información contenida en la celda en cuestión o en cada una de las celdas de la fila.
当該セル，または当該列の各セルにある情報の種類を示す．

valItem.desc: informazione esclusivamente descrittiva o del tipo etichetta
información exclusivamente descriptiva o del etiquetaje.

remarks.p: When this attribute is specified on a row, its value is the default for all cells in this row. When specified on a cell, its value overrides any default specified by the role attribute of the parent row element.

attDef.desc: indicates the number of rows occupied by this cell or row.
indica il numero di righe occupate dalla cella o riga in questione
indica el número de filas ocupado por una celda o por la fila en cuestión.
当該セルがある行，または当該行の，行番号を示す．
attDef.valDesc: A number; a value greater than one indicates that this cellm (or row) spans several rows.

remarks.p: Where several cells span several rows, it may be more convenient to use nested tables.

attDef.desc: indicates the number of columns occupied by this cell or row.
indica il numero di colonne occupate dalla cella o riga
indica el número de columnas que abraza una celda o fila.
当該セルまたは行がある，列番号を示す．
attDef.valDesc: A number; a value greater than one indicates that this cell or row spans several columns.

remarks.p: Where an initial cell spans an entire row, it may be better treated as a heading.
